${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:SuitcaseFgo.NAME: Suitcase
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b20%% #yfgo:NP.

${modID}:HalloweenRoyalty.NAME: Mystic Code
${modID}:HalloweenRoyalty.FLAVOR: A prestigious and noble product. Now you can be the (Halloween) Crown Prince!
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b5 turns, use Mystic Code's Master skill.
Every #b5 turns, use Mystic Code's Master skill(+).

${modID}:CommandSpell.NAME: Command Spell
${modID}:CommandSpell.FLAVOR: Command Spells are extremely powerful magic granted to each Master.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yfgo:Command_Spell are the three absolute commands which can be used with the #yRight click in Battle.

${modID}:SurpriseChocolate.NAME: Surprise Chocolate
${modID}:SurpriseChocolate.FLAVOR: The first time seems like just an attempt... let's do it again!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 random buff.

${modID}:LockChocolate.NAME: Lock Chocolate
${modID}:LockChocolate.FLAVOR: Make a choice and give it to someone important to you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yfgo:Evil_Curse.

${modID}:LockChocolateStrawberry.NAME: Lock Chocolate Strawberry
${modID}:LockChocolateStrawberry.FLAVOR: Carefully select the recipient of the gift.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, add a #yWall #yof #ySnow #yFlakes and #yBlack #yBarrel to your deck.

${modID}:AstrologicalTeapot.NAME: Astrological Teapot
${modID}:AstrologicalTeapot.FLAVOR: Drink it and deepen the bonds.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you use a potion, gain #b%d #yfgo:Guts.

${modID}:SaveStone.NAME: Save Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #yGold equal to your #b%d %% #yGold.

${modID}:BlessRockChoco.NAME: Blessed Lock-On Choco
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card is at or above #b3, reduce its cost by #b1 this turn.

${modID}:PoisonApple.NAME: Poison Apple
${modID}:PoisonApple.FLAVOR: An apple that looks suspicious no matter how it looks. The person who takes this and is willing to eat it must be a super good person.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yBlock, apply #b1 #yPoison to a random enemy.

${modID}:MisoPotato.NAME: Miso Potato
${modID}:MisoPotato.FLAVOR: Smuggled from the ZHIFU Mountains and circulated as simple food on the black market.

${modID}:FanNight.NAME: Fan Night
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you break an enemy's #yBlock the first time each combat, heal for #b20%% of your MAX HP.

${modID}:BurgerKing.NAME: Burger King
${modID}:BurgerKing.FLAVOR: Since protein can be converted into muscle, that's definitely 0 calories.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b40 and obtain a unique #rCurse.

${modID}:DreamChip.NAME: Dream Chip
${modID}:DreamChip.FLAVOR: A luxurious casino chip carrying dreams.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile the first time each combat, add a #yCalculated #yGamble into your hand.

${modID}:CosmicMedallion.NAME: Cosmic Medallion
DESCRIPTIONS: Block is not removed at the start of your next #b3 turn.

${modID}:MidsummerNightDream.NAME: Midsummer Night Dream
${modID}:MidsummerNightDream.FLAVOR: While these visions did appear. And this weak and idle theme, no more yielding but a dream.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can no longer become #yfgo:Evil_Curse.

${modID}:Salem.NAME: Existence Outside the Domain
DESCRIPTIONS: For each #rForeigner in your deck, at the start of each turn gain #b%d #yVigor.
You have no #rForeigner.
You have #b%d #rCurses.

${modID}:SkullCandy.NAME: Skull Candy
${modID}:SkullCandy.FLAVOR: Candy that has been resold multiple times.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUpgrade your Mystic Code's Master skill.

${modID}:ArchetypeORT.NAME: Archetype ORT
${modID}:ArchetypeORT.FLAVOR: A lifeform created (designed) by fusing ORT's heart with an extraterrestrial species.
DESCRIPTIONS: Converts your #yfgo:Invincibility to #yfgo:Anti-Purge_Defense. At the start of your 2nd turn and after each turn, gain #b10 fgo:Stars and #b3%% fgo:NP.

${modID}:OblivionCorrection.NAME: Oblivion Correction
${modID}:OblivionCorrection.FLAVOR: While humans are forgetful creatures, Avengers never forget.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b30%% #yfgo:Critical.

${modID}:SelfReplenishmentMagic.NAME: Self-Replenishment (Magic)
${modID}:SelfReplenishmentMagic.FLAVOR: Mana continues to surge forth until vengeance is complete.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain additional #b6%% #yfgo:NP.

${modID}:BB.NAME: BB
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain Buff or Debuff. Buff: gain #b2 #yStrength and #yDexterity. Debuff: gain #b1 #yVulnerable, #yFrail or #yWeak.

${modID}:BowInsignia.NAME: Bow Insignia
${modID}:BowInsignia.FLAVOR: A seal engraved with the Archer emblem.

${modID}:MechanicalProtector.NAME: Mechanical Protector
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Power card for #b3 times, a random enemy #yStunned.
This relic has been used up.
